0.Pros: friendly environment, great people to get to know and work with
0.Cons: had to wear a bright red shirt

1.Pros: Nothing. Even the discounts are horrible.
1.Cons: The managers are horrible. They cant keep track of breaks and they really enjoy giving you about an hour or two of work after the time that you're supposed to get out, a lot of the customers are horrible people, the franchise owner in my town isnt the friendliest person(he is only friendly to the customers of course), the workers are really immature, the discounts aren't even real discounts, they give you 8 hour shifts with only a day off a week, and minimum wage isn't worth all work and time you put in to the restaurant. You only get one day off a week.

2.Pros: They gave us a free meal and soft drink per shift, not much else, flexible schedules, decent pay, slow at times
2.Cons: Terrible manager, poor advancement, fast pace, the manager was honestly incompetent, hated a lot about working there

4.Pros: Easily promoted as long as you're willing to learnHours were very flexibleKind of free meals during shift
4.Cons: Managers don't really like to do their jobsMy supervisor was a horrible person and corporate did nothing to address employee or customer complaints

5.Pros: I worked with many different people and there were a variety of customers. Use to working under fast-paced and stressful conditions. It's where I discovered how important teamwork is.
5.Cons: Lack of discipline or motivation is easily contagious and working overnights resulted in no recognition.

6.Pros: You gain invaluable management experience, learning to delegate and put crew members in positions. The hours go by quickly because it's a lot of work and responsibility.
6.Cons: It is a lot of hard work and stress at times. Sometimes you will end up staying later than expected due to unforeseeable circumstances.

7.Pros: Friendly, fast paced work environment. Well informed management.
7.Cons: Unreliable hours of work from week to week.

8.Pros: flexible schedule, convenient for high school student
8.Cons: low pay, some co-workers were hard to get along with

9.Cons: To me there are no down sides
